name: MoFa - 7DRL Version
description:
A Roug-Like game made for 7DRL Challenge 2023.

How to play:

Cuz I didn't put any tutorial in the game so...

WASD to move. E for entering door and picking Object. description: 

Get your lantern ready, and prepare to enter the perilous dungeon! Embarking on adventure after adventure is essential in order to acquire the treasures of the strongest wizard. 

Various monsters have been influenced by these treasures, gaining special abilities, and defeating them will strengthen you. 

Take each step carefully: calculate your movements precisely and determine which enemies to defeat. The less traveled path leads to greater glory.

Note: This is a 7DRL version game, some detail like sound, ending or animation etc... are not complete at all. I'm still working on it and will upload to my page after it's finished.
